about_the_game:
"Last Chance: The Survivor" is a VR-based action-shooter game that chronicles the gripping journey of Gabriel, starting as a scientist in an army laboratory and continuing as a father searching for his daughter in a post-apocalyptic world. Following a devastating catastrophe that has ravaged the world, Gabriel focuses on one sole purpose in his ruined life: finding his lost daughter. During this journey, Gabriel faces the challenges of a broken world, enduring both physical and emotional battles.

Future Updates

Story Mode (Coming Soon)

Experience Gabriel's emotional journey as he searches for his daughter in a devastated world. The story mode will feature deep narrative elements and engaging character development. Stay tuned for updates as we continue to develop this mode.

Features

Realistic VR Experience

High-quality graphics and fluid VR mechanics for an immersive post-apocalyptic experience. Interact naturally with a world full of interactive objects and realistic physics.

Diverse Zombies

Face different types of zombies, each requiring unique combat approaches. From swift attackers to more formidable foes, adapt your strategy to survive.

Highscore Mode

Endless action in Highscore Mode. Aim for high scores against increasing zombie waves. Tests shooting skills, quick thinking, and agility.

Dynamic Audio

High-quality sound effects and music enhance the tension and atmosphere, immersing players in the game's world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, HTC Vive, OcuLus Rift S, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
